title: Edison Initiates Coverage on Pixium Vision
content:
SOURCE Edison Investment Research

LONDON 

Edison Investment Research, a leading international investment research firm, announces the initiation of full coverage of Pixium Vision. 

(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20130417/608168 )

Highlights of the analysis on Pixium Vision by Edison's healthcare analysts George Magrath 

Pixium Vision is a French medical device company developing retinal implants for patients with retinitis pigmentosa and macular degeneration. Its lead product is an epi-retinal implant scheduled for CE Mark application in 2015. A sub-retinal implant is being developed simultaneously.

We use a risk-adjusted NPV model with a 12.5% discount factor to achieve a value of €133.42m or €10.51/share. We assume Iris and Prima pricing is consistent with the current reimbursement of Second Sight's Argus II retinal implant. Pixium is capitalised with €31m in cash, with a burn rate of approximately €20m per year.
